File libsrc/libFFDB/FFDBStatic.c

Routines for setting the location of and reading static CSS table files.

Public Function Index

FFDBGetLikeNet (FFDatabase, const char *)
Get the network name.
FFDBGetNetwork (FFDatabase, const char *)
Get the network that contains a station.
FFDBGetStaticTable (FFDatabase, const char *)
Get a static table filename.
FFDBReadStaticTable (FFDatabase, const char *, Vector)
Read a Flat-File static table.
FFDBSetStaticTable (FFDatabase, const char *, const char *)
Set a static table filename.

Public Functions

FFDBGetLikeNet 
 const char *FFDBGetLikeNet(FFDatabase ffdb,
                            const char *sta)
Get the network name. If an affiliated network is not found, return the network name that starts with the station name.

Parameters:
ffdb - An FFDatabase pointer obtained from FFDBOpen().
sta - The input station name.
Returns:
The network name or sta, if the network name is not found.
FFDBGetNetwork 
 const char *FFDBGetNetwork(FFDatabase ffdb,
                            const char *sta)
Get the network that contains a station.

Parameters:
ffdb - An FFDatabase pointer obtained from FFDBOpen().
sta - The input station name.
Returns:
The network name or NULL, if the station is uknown.
FFDBGetStaticTable 
 char *FFDBGetStaticTable(FFDatabase ffdb,
                          const char *cssTableName)
Get a static table filename. Get the name of the file currently being used for a static CSS table. Returns NULL, if no table file exits. The default location of a static file is (param_root)/static/global.cssTableNameo or $GEOTOOL_HOME/tables/static/global.cssTableName. Use FFDBSetStaticTable to override this default with another filename.

Parameters:
ffdb - An FFDatabase pointer obtained from FFDBOpen().
cssTableName - The name of the table.
Returns:
the filename. Do not free.
FFDBReadStaticTable 
 int FFDBReadStaticTable(FFDatabase ffdb,
                         const char *cssTableName,
                         Vector v)
Read a Flat-File static table. The default location for all static tables is (parameter_root)/static/global.cssTableName or $GEOTOOL_HOME/tables/static/global.cssTableName. Use the routine FFDBSetStaticTable to override the default location before calling this routine. This routine returns 0, if a static file is not found in the static directory, and an alternative location has not been set. It returns 1, if the file is found and successfully read. It returns -1, if an error occurs while opening or reading the file.

Parameters:
ffdb - An FFDatabase pointer obtained from FFDBOpen().
v - A vector to receive the CssTable objects.
Returns:
-1, 0, or 1. Use FFDBErrno() and FFDBErrMsg() to retrieve the error number and message.
FFDBSetStaticTable 
 int FFDBSetStaticTable(FFDatabase ffdb,
                        const char *cssTableName,
                        const char *path)
Set a static table filename. Set the name of a static table file and override the default locations of (param_root)/static/global.cssTableName or $GEOTOOL_HOME/tables/static/global.cssTableName.

Parameters:
ffdb - An FFDatabase pointer obtained from FFDBOpen().
cssTableName - The name of the table.
path - The name of the table file.
Returns:
0 for success, -1 for an error. Use FFDBErrno() and FFDBErrMsg() to retrieve the error number and message.
